name: The Mission (Older Timer)
description:
You've accepted a wager that you'll discover Quetzalcoatl's toothpick and now wonder if you've perhaps bitten off a bit more than you can chew. Unless you succeed in your quest you'll be in penury for the rest of your life.

This is a large text-only game for the PC which will run either from Windows or in a DOS window.

All files in the zipped folder, with the exception of the file Read Me.txt, must be present in the game folder for the game to run. No other apps are required.

Unlike in my later games it is possible to get yourself into an unwinnable situation.
